name: Deadly Blue
description: Deadly blue is a journey through the world full of dangers, where you will fight against the evil creatures, overcome different obstacles on the way to your beloved.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Processor: 3 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space
